title: Person of Interest // Come As You Are
author: mse
comment: This is fucking amazing. If this doesn't get people to watch the show, I dunno what will. Person of Interest is such an underrated show. I've watched it more than ten times and still see stuff that I missed.
So glad to see there still remains some fans to do some good edits. It’s a big misfortune that this show doesn’t get what it deserved. Best series ever!
description:
PoI fanvid / tribute.

Character focus: John Reese, Harold Finch, Joss Carter, Root, Sameen Shaw, Lionel Fusco, The Machine

Voiceovers in subtitles.

As usual I don't own anything nor do I profit in any way, @copyrightholders: please don't hurt me.
